question_text:
Question 21 
 
A hot steel spherical ball is suddenly dipped into a low temperature oil bath. Which of the following 
dimensionless parameters are required to determine instantaneous center temperature of the ball using 
a Heisler chart?
Heat Transfer (Unsteady State Conduction) 
 
(A) Biot number and Fourier number    
(B) Reynolds number and Prandlt number  
 
(C) Nusselt number and Grashoff number  
(D) Biot number and Froude number 
Ans. 
A 
Sol.
 
In case of Heisler chart,

So, Biot number and Fourier number are required to determine instantaneous centre temperature of the 
ball. 
 
Hence, the correct option is (A).
